transcript: a lot of people say I did my best and I think they're lying or they're cutting themselves short if you really try your best like your family is going to die unless you nail this thing you try different the more you do the more you realize you are capable of doing that's like the fun challenge where the more I do the more the bar raises and so it just becomes this virtuous cycle but it's self-fulfilling and the only person who judges that is me
